scripts.serve: concurrently "tsc --watch true --project functions" 'FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST="localhost:8080" firebase emulators:start' "cd app && npm run serve" "sleep 10 && browser-sync start --proxy http://localhost:8888 --directory app"
scripts.deploy: cd app && npm run build && cd .. && rm public -r && mv app/dist public && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:hosting: cd app && npm run build && cd .. && rm public -r && mv app/dist public && firebase deploy --only hosting
